title: I've been stuck over 2 hours in a ghost game, please send help
body: Over two hours ago my game ended and i'm still stuck. Tried restarting my computer, didn't work. I guess i'll just try again in the morning if nothing can really be done about it.

replies.body: I've also been trapped in a ghost game for almost 4 hours now. I've looked around online both here in the forums, Reddit etc. and it seems really widespread today. Riot's only responses have been "it's a rare issue" and that all we can do is "just wait"...

Sadly the only way to fix these ghost game issues is to wait for the game to finally clear out and tell the servers that it's over. It could still take a bit of time, but we do have some guys working on it to see about speeding the process up a bit.
Alright resolved, 3 hours in the problem fixed itself. Although the lp i won still isn't there and will prob take longer to add in. Best of luck to all the others stuck in the void out there.
